title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and tool callers in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); Markdown, code highlighting, RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, tools, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, delete, and list models with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, prompt templates, and model switching on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline autocomplete.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models natively in .NET.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to local Ollama instances; supports markdown, code blocks, and model picker.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support, PVC, and service exposure.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images for Ollama with CUDA & ROCm variants; one-liner to run Llama 3 locally.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package; 40k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package; 200k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG chatbot with Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain in 50 lines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for Q&A, summarization, and note generation using local models.

title: ollama-function-calling
summary: Official example showing how to use Ollama’s native function/tool calling API with JSON schema.
